net.bytebuddy.asm

类 Advice.Appender.EmulatingMethodVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.bytebuddy.jar.asm.MethodVisitor
      • net.bytebuddy.asm.Advice.Appender.EmulatingMethodVisitor
  • 封闭类:
    Advice.Appender

    protected static class Advice.Appender.EmulatingMethodVisitor
extends MethodVisitor
    A method visitor that allows for the emulation of a full method visitor invocation circle without delegating initial and ending visitations to the underlying visitor.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 net.bytebuddy.jar.asm.MethodVisitor

        api, mv

    • 构造器概要

      Creates a new emulating method visitor.

      void visitEnd()
      Visits the end of the method.

        protected EmulatingMethodVisitor(MethodVisitor methodVisitor,

        Creates a new emulating method visitor.
        参数:
        methodVisitor - The underlying method visitor.
        delegate - The delegate byte code appender.

    • 方法详细资料

      • resolve

        protected ByteCodeAppender.Size resolve(MethodVisitor methodVisitor,
                                        Implementation.Context implementationContext,
                                        MethodDescription instrumentedMethod)
        Resolves this this advice emulating method visitor for its delegate.
        参数:
        methodVisitor - The method visitor to apply.
        implementationContext - The implementation context to apply.
        instrumentedMethod - The instrumented method.
        返回:
        The resulting size of the implemented method.

      • visitCode

        从类复制的说明: MethodVisitor

      • visitMaxs

        public void visitMaxs(int stackSize,
                      int localVariableLength)
        从类复制的说明: MethodVisitor
        Visits the maximum stack size and the maximum number of local variables of the method.
        覆盖:
        visitMaxs 在类中 MethodVisitor
        参数:
        stackSize - maximum stack size of the method.
        localVariableLength - maximum number of local variables for the method.

      • visitEnd

        public void visitEnd()
        从类复制的说明: MethodVisitor
        Visits the end of the method. This method, which is the last one to be called, is used to inform the visitor that all the annotations and attributes of the method have been visited.
        覆盖:
        visitEnd 在类中 MethodVisitor
